detaileddescription.para: String containing the CVS revision. Read out via reflection!
This field separates gene class name from the gene persistent representation string. '*' does not work properly with URLEncoder!
Represents the heading delimiter that is used to separate genes in the persistent representation of Chromosome instances.
Represents the closing delimiter that is used to separate genes in the persistent representation of Chromosome instances.
Separates chromosome-related information.
The configuration object to use
The array of Genes contained in this Chromosome.
Unique ID of the chromosome that allows to distinct it from other chromosomes. In the best case, this ID is unique worldwide.
In case mutation, crossing over etc. happened, this sequence gives evidence about the parent(s) of the current chromosome.
The only constructor in this class. Sets the immutable configuration.

simplesect.para: unique ID of the chromosome, which allows to distinct this instance from others, in the best case worldwide

detaileddescription.para: A template is a chromosome that is the logical predecessor of the current chromosome. A template can occur in mutation or crossing over. In the latter case can be at least two template chromosomes. This is why in this setter method the parameter a_index exists.

parameterdescription.para: the unique ID of the template
the index of the template, e.g. in crossing over for the second candidate chromosome this is 2
the index of the template to retrieve the key for

detaileddescription.para: Creates and returns a copy of this object.
Increases the number of evolutionary rounds of chromosome in which it has not been changed by one.
Reset age of chromosome because it has been changed.

simplesect.para: 0: Chromosome newly created in this generation. This means it does not need being crossed over with another newly created one

parameterdescription.para: set the age of the chromosome, see BestChromosomesSelector for a use-case

detaileddescription.para: Increase information of number of genetic operations performed on chromosome in current evolution round.
Resets the information of how many genetic operators have been performed on the chromosome in the current round of evolution.

simplesect.para: number of genetic operations performed on chromosome in current evolution round

detaileddescription.para: Retrieves the set of genes that make up this Chromosome. This method exists primarily for the benefit of GeneticOperators that require the ability to manipulate Chromosomes at a low level.

simplesect.para: an array of the Genes contained within this Chromosome

detaileddescription.para: Sets the genes for the chromosome.

parameterdescription.para: the genes to set for the chromosome
in case constraint checker is provided

detaileddescription.para: Returns the Gene at the given index (locus) within the Chromosome. The first gene is at index zero and the last gene is at the index equal to the size of this Chromosome - 1.

parameterdescription.para: index of the gene value to be returned

detaileddescription.para: Returns the size of this Chromosome (the number of genes it contains). A Chromosome's size is constant and will not change, until setGenes(...) is used.

simplesect.para: number of genes contained within this Chromosome instance

detaileddescription.para: Returns a persistent representation of this chromosome, see interface Gene for description. Similar to CompositeGene's routine. But does not include all information of the chromosome (yet).

simplesect.para: string representation of this Chromosome's relevant parts of its current state
the persistent representation of the chromosome by considering its genes.

detaileddescription.para: Retrieves the persistent representation of the chromosome by considering its genes.

parameterdescription.para: the variable to store the persistent representation in

detaileddescription.para: Counterpart of getPersistentRepresentation.

parameterdescription.para: the string representation retrieved from a prior call to the getPersistentRepresentation() method

detaileddescription.para: Creates a new Gene instance.
Taken from CompositeGene.

parameterdescription.para: persistent representation of the gene to create (could be obtained via getPersistentRepresentation)

detaileddescription.para: Splits the input a_string into individual gene representations.
Taken and adapted from CompositeGene.

simplesect.para: the elements of the returned array are the persistent representation strings of the chromosome's components

detaileddescription.para: Base class for any implementation of interface IChromosome.
